sentences.en: The quality , optical transmissivity and homogeneity of the sapphire boule have remarkably improved.
sentences.cn: 经测试,Al2O3晶体的完整性 、 光学透过率和光学均匀性均有显著提高.

sentences.en: The variety of boule includes ruby, starlight ruby, sapphire, beautiful sapphire and starlight sapphire.
sentences.cn: 刚玉的种类包括(红宝石 、 星光红宝石 、 蓝宝石 、 艳色蓝宝石、星光蓝宝石).

sentences.en: You may form the loaves into boule, or any other style that pleases you.
sentences.cn: 你也可将面团整形成圆球状或是自己喜欢的形状.
